attributes.action: Boil RMT Leader Bob Crow down for soap, in order that he may be of use to someone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bob crow will call his union out at the drop of a hat, causing huge and unnecessary delays on London's tube network. If he were turned into soap, he wouldn't.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
